reviewText: This is a 3 tape set. The first is called Hollywood Stars. Watch the earliest performances of some of our greatest stars: Marilyn Monroe, Sylvester Stallone, Ava Gardner, John Wayne, Johnny Carson, Sean Connery, Jack Nicholson and many more(60 min. color & B&W). Hollywood's Classic Trailers: Features trailers from some of the greatest films of all time...The African Queen, Key Largo, Sergeant York, Citizen Kane, Notorious and many more. (59 min. color & B&W) The Great Swashbucklers: From the Three Musketeers to Robin Hood this is a look at the unstoppable characters that played the roles of some of Hollywood's most famous films. Scenes from; Black Beard, Captain Kid, Cyrano de Berjorac, Swashbuckler and many more.(60 min color & B&W. All recorded in SP for high quality. I found this a fantastic set of videos!
